title: Administration
context: [ยง844D-2] Administration. The department shall be responsible for the management and administration of the state DNA database and data bank identification program and for liaison with the FBI and other relevant agencies regarding the State&rsquo;s participation in a national DNA database such as the FBI&rsquo;s Combined DNA Index System, that allows the storage and exchange of DNA records submitted by state and local forensic DNA laboratories nationwide. [L 2005, c 112, pt of ยง1]
